suite.name: Simularpoupanca

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Implicit Wait
kw.doc: Sets the implicit wait value used by Selenium.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets current windows size to given ``width`` and ``height``.

kw.name: Dado que eu acesso a página da Sicredi
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Eu como associado quando preencho os campos para simulação
Get File
kw.doc: Returns the contents of a specified file.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the results.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Select Radio Button
kw.doc: Sets the radio button group ``group_name`` to ``value``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Então Devo visualizar o formulário de simulação "R$ 2.823"

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.
